articles.title: European orbiter survives major blow from Sun near Venus - India Today
articles.description: The Solar Orbiter was hit by a coronal mass ejection from the Sun as it came close to Venus for a gravity assist.

On its way to the Sun, the Solar Orbiter has survived a major blow from its host.
